scripts.dev-update: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config build/deploy_commands.js dotenv_config_path=./.env.development.local
scripts.update: sudo npm run build && node -r dotenv/config build/deploy_commands.js dotenv_config_path=./.env.production.local
scripts.start: sudo npm run build && node -r dotenv/config . dotenv_config_path=./.env.production.local
